name: Chutney Eggs
author: KAREN
summary: Here's a zesty variation on an old favorite that your guests will look forward to every time they visit. Bacon and chutney are the keys to these flavor packed eggs.
directions: Place eggs in a medium saucepan and cover with cold water
Bring water to a boil and immediately remove from heat
Cover and let eggs stand in hot water for 10 to 12 minutes
Remove from hot water, cool and peel
Place bacon in a large, deep skillet
Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown; drain and crumble
In a medium bowl, mash egg yolks and mix with bacon, chutney, mayonnaise and almonds
Fill the egg whites with the mixture
